title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Cook pancetta until crispy. Combine all ingredients and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine. Cook chicken and set aside. In a pan, melt butter, add garlic, cream, and cheese. Combine with pasta and chicken.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add garlic and ginger. Add vegetables and stir fry. Add soy sauce and cook until vegetables are tender.

title: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on dough. Add cheese and basil. Drizzle with oil. Bake until crust is golden and cheese is melted.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill chicken and slice. Toss lettuce with dressing, croutons, and cheese. Top with chicken.

title: Beef Stew
instructions: Brown beef. Add vegetables, broth, and tomato paste. Simmer until beef is tender. Season with thyme.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients and mix. Cook on a griddle until bubbles form and flip.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and curry powder. Add tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer until chicken is cooked.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients and chocolate chips. Bake until golden.

title: Lasagna
instructions: Cook noodles. Layer noodles, sauce, beef, and cheeses in a baking dish. Bake until bubbly and golden.

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables. Toss with feta, olives, oil, and oregano.

title: BBQ Ribs
instructions: Season ribs. Bake covered until tender. Brush with BBQ sauce and bake uncovered until caramelized.

title: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook garlic in butter. Add shrimp, lemon juice, and wine. Cook until shrimp is pink. Garnish with parsley.

title: French Toast
instructions: Mix eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla. Dip bread in mixture and cook in butter until golden.

title: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados. Mix in lime juice, onion, tomato, cilantro, and salt.

title: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Cook onion, carrot, and celery. Add tomatoes, beans, broth, and pasta. Simmer until pasta is cooked. Add basil.

title: Apple Pie
instructions: Mix apples with sugar and spices. Fill crust with apple mixture. Top with crust and bake until golden.

title: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Bread chicken with breadcrumbs and parmesan. Bake until cooked. Top with sauce and mozzarella. Bake until cheese is melted.

title: Fish Tacos
instructions: Cook fish. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, lime, cilantro, and sour cream.
